column2: Tax structure: Excise tax proportion of price
column3: Tax structure: Type of excise tax applied
column5: Tax structure: Greater reliance on specific tax in mixed excise regime
column6: Tax structure: Minimum specific tax applied in ad valorem or mixed excise regime
column7: Tax structure: Retail price used as base of ad valorem component in ad valorem or mixed excise regime (or retail price exclusive of VAT)
column8: Affordability: % of GDP per capita required to purchase 100 packs of most sold brand (the higher the %, the less affordable)
column9: Affordability: Cigarettes are less affordable in 2014 compared to 2008
column10: Affordability: Specific tax component automatically adjusted for inflation (or other)
column11: Affordability: Price dispersion: share of cheapest brand price in premium brand price (the higher the % the smaller the gap)
column12: Tax administration: Tax stamps applied on tobacco products
column13: Tax administration: Bans or limits on duty free imports by travellers
column14: Tax administration: If duty free imports are limited, duty free allowance (number of cigarette sticks)

column1: United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
